attributes.action: Re examine the Sgt Blackman case before the MoD hide the new evidence.
attributes.background: Sgt Blackman was convicted of a murder on the battlefield in Afghanistan in 2011. Was tried at a court martial and found quilty on a split of 5 - 2. The panel consisted of men who had never served on the battlefiled. It has now come out that relevant information had beed supressed.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/108570

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
